amendment.description: An amendment numbered 131 printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 to require the Director of the NSF to commission a study to mea sure the economic impact of inflation on cost-of-living, the American workforce, American international competitiveness, and rural and underserved communities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Director of the NSF to commission a study to mea sure the economic impact of inflation on cost-of-living, the American workforce, American international competitiveness, and rural and underserved communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bice (OK) amendment (A010) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 279 - 153 (Roll no. 26).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A010) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Bice (OK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bice (OK) amendment (A010) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 279 - 153 (Roll no. 26).
